name: Global Vision IT
overview:
Global Vision, a CRM software and services company, is a Microsoft Enterprise Partner for Microsoft Dynamics CRM and developers of Adora marketing automation software for the retail and fast moving consumer goods market.

Adora enables marketers and agencies to engage with their consumers in a personalised, one-to-one, interactive and revealing dialogue across the most appropriate channe, such as email, SMS, Web and Call Center. Features include multi-channel campaign management, enterprise feedback management (survey management), marketing resource management, predictive analysis, business intelligence, consumer segmentation, digital asset management, master data management and loyalty programme management.

Global Vision customers include Archers, Billabong, BP, Bushmills, Guinness, Johnnie Walker, Levi Strauss & Co, LG, Nestle, Nokia, Protea Hotels and Smirnoff. Partners include, Accenture, PriceWaterhouseCoopers and Wunderman.

milestones.description: Launch of Adora, the next generation of Global Vision's relationship marketing software (formerly known as Eureka)
